title: TV/Radio
text:
Published: Mon, October 19, 2015 @ 12:00 a.m.

9 a.m. (TNN) Tennis: Erste Bank Open. 
1:30 p.m. (ESPN) “NFL Primetime.” 
2:55 p.m. (NBCSN) Soccer; Swansea vs. Stoke City, Barclays Premier League.

7 p.m. (FSN Ohio) NBA preseason: Mavericks at Cavaliers. 
7 p.m. (NHLN) NHL: Sharks at Rangers. 
7 p.m. (WKBN-AM 570) College football: “Penguins Playbook.” 
8 p.m. (FS1) MLB Playoffs: Royals at Blue Jays, ALCS Game 3. 
8:15 p.m. (ESPN) NFL: Giants at Eagles.
